name: Early Worm: A Wormy Journey
description:
Early Worm is my first game, made over the past two and a half weeks in Game Maker Studio. It is a 2D game of sorts where you follow the story of a worm named Manny trying to get to the disco.

Playtime is about 30 minutes.

Please check it out, and rate/give feedback if you can.

Credits:

Everything but music by Jackson Allen

@Jackson_T_Allen on Twitter

(Send feedback here if you want me to see it quickly)

Music by Ryan Shaffer

hppyfcspdr.bandcamp.com
